itemInfo.itemDesc: An item that helps ease a petâ€™s hunger. Recovers 70 Satiety.

item.name: Oatmeal
item.desc:
A mixture of grain powder and milk. 

- Unique Effect: Recover +5 Worker Stamina (Use through the Worker Menu on the world map)

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 1 sec

item.name: Oatmeal
item.desc:
A mixture of grain powder and milk. 

- Unique Effect: Recover +5 Worker Stamina (Use through the Worker Menu on the world map)

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 1 sec

item.name: Pork
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a pig corpse.

- Usage: Steak, Meat Stew, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Mudskipper
item.desc: An ingredient that can be sold to a Trader or used in Cooking. It can be obtained through Fishing.\n- Usage: Fried Fish, Steamed Fish, Fish Soup, etc.

item.name: Chicken Meat
item.desc:
An ingredient used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Bartali Farm, Finto Farm

- Usage: Fried Bird, Steamed Bird, etc.

item.name: Refined Oatmeal
item.desc:
Oatmeal made with excellent-quality grains. 

- Unique Effect: Restore +6 Worker Stamina (Use through the Worker Menu on the world map).

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 1 sec

item.name: Refined Oatmeal
item.desc:
